To All,

For anyone who is serious about appreciating and studying Japanese=
 swords, 
fittings and weaponry, going to Japan and visiting some of the fi=
nest 
museums, castles, sword stores and the annual Dai-Token-Ichi are an a=
bsolute 
MUST. Attached is the itinerary for the upcoming tour from October=
 16th to 
October 27th.  It is only 5 months from now so now is a good time=
 to do some 
advance planning. All things considered, the cost of the trip =
is a modest 
investment as you will learn, see and experience so much. If y=
ou confine 
yourselves to sword shows and museums in the USA, you will NEVE=
R advance 
your knowledge. I organize and conduct the one and only comprehe=
nsive and 
focused Japanese swords, fittings and weaponry tour.
Thanks for =
reading,

Fred
